executable.title: Transfer Labels to Regions (TubeTK)
executable.description: Label regions in one image based on overlap with labels in another image (TubeTK).
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

file.name: argInImageFileName
file.label: Input Image Filename
file.description: Filename of the input CVT image.

file.name: argInLabelFileName
file.label: Input Label Filename
file.description: Filename of the label map image.

file.name: argOutImageFileName
file.label: Output Image Filename
file.description: File name of the labeled output CVT image.

file.name: argOutMappingFileName
file.label: Output Mapping Filename
file.description: File name of the output mapping file, mapping CVT cell IDs to discrete labels or a label histogram.

boolean.name: argOutputHistogram
boolean.label: Output Feature Histogram
boolean.description: Produces a mapping file with CVT cell ->feature histogram, instead of CVT cell ->Dominant label.
